QuestionText: You see a gondola ride <audio src="soundbank://soundlibrary/boats_ships/oar_boat/oar_boat_01"/> Do you take it, yes or no?
You hear commotion and church bells ringing <audio src="soundbank://soundlibrary/musical/amzn_sfx_church_bell_1x_05"/> Look it's in Saint Peter's square. Do you see what's going on, yes or no?

<audio src="soundbank://soundlibrary/animals/amzn_sfx_horse_huff_whinny_01"/> You've always wanted to live the life of an Australian Cowboy. You have the opportunity to herd and shear sheep. Do you take it, yes or no?

As you're having lunch at La Pergola, <audio src="soundbank://soundlibrary/foley/amzn_sfx_restaurant_ambience_01"/> someone offers you two free tickets to the Tuscan Pasta Making Class and Wine Tasting. Do you take it, yes or no?

You've always imagined being one of the spectators when gladiators fought at the colosseum <audio src="soundbank://soundlibrary/swords/swords_03"/> Do you walk through the history of Rome's majesty at the colosseum, yes or no?

You land in scenic Sydney. <audio src="soundbank://soundlibrary/transportation/amzn_sfx_airplane_takeoff_whoosh_01"/> When you leave the airport, you're offered a free tour via a harbour boat cruise that makes a stop by the magnificent Sydney Opera House. Do you take it, yes or no?

You're exploring the Red desert <audio src="soundbank://soundlibrary/nature/amzn_sfx_strong_wind_desert_01"/> flora and fauna around you in breathtaking detail as you leisurely cross the vast expanse. You see a camel that you can ride. Do you get on it, yes or no?
